items.title: I am 100(ish)% qualified for this role
items.explanation: Okay, maybe saying that I am almost 100% ready is a little ambitious. But hey, exaggerating our capabilites is America's 3rd favorite passtime, so I get a pass. I've been fucking grinding. Even though I don't think I am ready, I am. One of my most salient personality traits is resolve. I work hard on problems, even when they're tough. This is my third attempt at teaching myself how to code since 2019 and I have finally made it through the valley of despair. Seriously, I am ready.

items.title: I am a well rounded person
items.explanation: Tooting my own horn is something I usually do in private. But boy, I am a blast to work with. I know when to put my head down, when to make the room smile, and most importantly when to shut tf up. I do not come froma technicaly background in education nor in my career so far. In fact, my background has consisted of talking to people. I am really good at it. That's why they call me Johnny2Smooth.

items.title: I have something to prove.
items.explanation: A hungry dog bites harder, and dog, I am HUNGRY. I live with my parents. I love them with all my heart, but it is time for me to start making some paper and let my wings take me with the breeze.
